languages.text: [Прикрикнуть на Авеля] "Ты у меня будешь изъясняться внятно!"
[Respond sharply to Abel] "You will express yourself clearly!"
languages.original_text: [Прикрикнуть на Авеля] "Ты у меня будешь изъясняться внятно!"

traits.locale_text: [Give Abel a snappy response] "I will have you speak coherently!"
[Give Abel a snappy response] "I will have you speak coherently!"
[Give Abel a snappy response] "I will have you speak coherently!"
[Give Abel a snappy response] "I will have you speak coherently!"
[Respond sharply to Abel] "You will express yourself clearly!"
[Respond sharply to Abel] "You will express yourself clearly!"

languages.text: [アベルに鋭く言い返す]「はっきりと説明しろ！」
languages.original_text: [Respond sharply to Abel] "You will express yourself clearly!"

traits.locale_text: [アベルに鋭く言い返す]「はっきりと説明しろ！」

languages.text: [对亚伯厉声高喝]“你给我把话说明白点！”
languages.original_text: [Respond sharply to Abel] "You will express yourself clearly!"

traits.locale_text: [对亚伯厉声高喝]“你给我说话痛快点！”

languages.text: [Abel scharf antworten] "Drückt Euch gefälligst klar aus!"
languages.original_text: [Respond sharply to Abel] "You will express yourself clearly!"

traits.locale_text: [Abel ungehalten antworten] "Ihr werdet Euch verständlich ausdrücken!"

languages.text: [Répondre vertement à Abel] « Foin de votre charabia, exprimez-vous clairement, que diable ! »
languages.original_text: [Respond sharply to Abel] "You will express yourself clearly!"

traits.locale_text: [Répondre vertement à Abel] « Foin de votre charabia, exprimez-vous clairement, que diable ! »

languages.text: [Responder a Abel con sequedad] «¡Hable con claridad!».
languages.original_text: [Respond sharply to Abel] "You will express yourself clearly!"

traits.locale_text: [Responder a Abel con sequedad] «¡Más le vale hablarme con coherencia!».

languages.text: [Abel'e sert bir yanıt ver] "Kendini net bir şekilde ifade edeceksin!"
languages.original_text: [Respond sharply to Abel] "You will express yourself clearly!"

traits.locale_text: [Abel'e sert bir yanıt ver] "Kendini net bir şekilde ifade edeceksin!"
